V.iv.1.B.4.b
.
Data Capture of Special Provision Codes
VBMS-R captures the required special provision code data for
Codesheet
entry based on selection(s) made from the OTHER - SPECIAL PROVISION DETERMINATIONS drop-down on the ISSUE MANAGEMENT tab.
Reference
:Â  For further information on selection of special provisions, see the
VBMS-R User Guide
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section B - Codesheet Section
citation: Part V, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section B
